title: Elgato EyeTV 3 full - serial included
description:
EyeTV turns your Mac into the coolest TV set in the house. Work or surf the Web and watch TV at the same time. Record your shows to enjoy later, and play them on your iPod and iPhone.

EyeTV is the award-winning software that powers the great features in all of Elgato&#039;s TV Tuners. The software is also available separately for use with compatible third party peripherals.


Compatible Peripherals:

EyeTV USB
EyeTV 200
EyeTV 250
EyeTV 250 Plus
EyeTV 300/310
EyeTV 400/410
EyeTV 500
EyeTV 610
EyeTV Diversity
